title: Best Samsung Galaxy A55 5G fast chargers
description: Charge your Samsung Galaxy A55 quickly with these fast chargers. The post Best Samsung Galaxy A55 5G fast chargers appeared first on Phandroid.
author: Ajit Singh
excerpt: Charge your Samsung Galaxy A55 quickly with these fast chargers.
text: The Samsung Galaxy A55 is a decent package considering its asking price. You get a big 6.6-inch AMOLED display, Exynos 1480 processor, and up to 12GB of RAM. It has a triple rear camera setup featuring a 50MP wide sensor, a 12MP ultrawide sensor, and a 5MP macro sensor. There is a huge 5,000mAh battery to keep the lights on. The best part is it supports 25W wired fast charging for a quick top-up. All you need is a compatible fast charger to get the job done. Here are the best Samsung Galaxy A55 5G fast chargers you should buy. Samsung 25W USB-C Charger It is the official Samsung fast charger with 25W charging speed. It has a single USB-C port and charges only one device at a time. It does not come bundled with a charging cable. It is available in Black color. Sale Anker Nano 3 511 30W USB-C Charger This is a compact fast charger with up to 30W charging speed. It has a single USB-C port will help you charge the phone faster. It is 70% smaller than a traditional charger, making it quite compact. Its foldable prongs further help with convenient carrying. Sale Anker Ace 25W USB-C Charger This is a charger compatible with Samsung Super Fast Charging technology. Its foldable design i.e. foldable prongs make it 23% smaller than a traditional charger. You can use it to charge one device at a time. It offers over-voltage protection, current regulation, and over-temperature protection like many other Anker chargers. UGREEN Nexode 30W USB-C Charger It is another USB-C port charge in the list but with 30W charging speed. It is also quite compact and has foldable prongs. Its Thermal Guard technology keeps a check on the temperature. Sale Belkin 40W USB-C Charger This fast charger from Belkin features dual USB-C ports. It can be used to charge two devices at the same time (20W charging speed each). It is USB-C PD 3.0 charging tech certified. The charger has foldable prongs which make it easier to carry around. Sale Amazon Basics 30W USB-C Charger This is an Amazon Basics fast charger with a single USB-C port. It is capable of delivering up to 30W charging speed. It also has foldable prongs which is something many prefer. Sale INIU 30W USB-C and USB-A Charger It is a dual port charger featuring a PD 30W port and a QC 18W port. The first one is USB-C and the second one is a USB-A port. You can use it to charge two devices at the same time. Ajit is a freelance tech reporter who loves everything tech but has a soft corner for Android. He started his stint in tech journalism in 2015 and has previously worked with publications like Digit India and Android Headlines. You can also find his work on MySmartPrice. html:
The Samsung Galaxy A55 is a decent package considering its asking price. You get a big 6.6-inch AMOLED display, Exynos 1480 processor, and up to 12GB of RAM. It has a triple rear camera setup featuring a 50MP wide sensor, a 12MP ultrawide sensor, and a 5MP macro sensor.

There is a huge 5,000mAh battery to keep the lights on. The best part is it supports 25W wired fast charging for a quick top-up. All you need is a compatible fast charger to get the job done. Here are the best Samsung Galaxy A55 5G fast chargers you should buy.

Samsung 25W USB-C Charger

It is the official Samsung fast charger with 25W charging speed. It has a single USB-C port and charges only one device at a time. It does not come bundled with a charging cable. It is available in Black color.

Sale

Anker Nano 3 511 30W USB-C Charger

This is a compact fast charger with up to 30W charging speed. It has a single USB-C port will help you charge the phone faster. It is 70% smaller than a traditional charger, making it quite compact. Its foldable prongs further help with convenient carrying.

Sale

Anker Ace 25W USB-C Charger

This is a charger compatible with Samsung Super Fast Charging technology. Its foldable design i.e. foldable prongs make it 23% smaller than a traditional charger. You can use it to charge one device at a time. It offers over-voltage protection, current regulation, and over-temperature protection like many other Anker chargers.

UGREEN Nexode 30W USB-C Charger

It is another USB-C port charge in the list but with 30W charging speed. It is also quite compact and has foldable prongs. Its Thermal Guard technology keeps a check on the temperature.

Sale

Belkin 40W USB-C Charger

This fast charger from Belkin features dual USB-C ports. It can be used to charge two devices at the same time (20W charging speed each). It is USB-C PD 3.0 charging tech certified. The charger has foldable prongs which make it easier to carry around.

Sale

Amazon Basics 30W USB-C Charger

This is an Amazon Basics fast charger with a single USB-C port. It is capable of delivering up to 30W charging speed. It also has foldable prongs which is something many prefer.

Sale

INIU 30W USB-C and USB-A Charger

It is a dual port charger featuring a PD 30W port and a QC 18W port. The first one is USB-C and the second one is a USB-A port. You can use it to charge two devices at the same time.

Note: this article may contain affiliate links that help support our authors and keep the Phandroid servers running.

Ajit is a freelance tech reporter who loves everything tech but has a soft corner for Android. He started his stint in tech journalism in 2015 and has previously worked with publications like Digit India and Android Headlines. You can also find his work on MySmartPrice.
